name: Don't Push My Button(s)!
description:
Don't Push My Button(s)! is a death run style game where you must fend off a parallel universe version of yourself who is good and has come to destroy your evil lair! The project fits the theme of  'Unexpected' because it defies the user's expectation of the normal 'the parallel universe version of you is evil!' and instead brings the good version of your character into the game from a parallel universe to stop you.

Gameplay features buttons that trigger traps that do their own unique things.

Wear down your parallel universe self with your TNT and Bear traps!

Don't let them reach the Self Destruct button!!!

Coded badly and quickly since I joined in on the jam half-way through, didn't even get to make any models :)

Special thanks to: Unity's Particle System
